courses.title: Beginner Piano
courses.description: Learn the basics of playing the piano, including fundamental techniques and simple songs.

courses.title: Advanced Guitar
courses.description: Master the guitar with advanced techniques and music theory for intermediate players.

courses.title: Vocal Training
courses.description: Explore the world of vocal training, focusing on pitch, tone, and vocal health.

courses.title: Jazz Saxophone
courses.description: Delve into jazz saxophone, covering improvisation, scales, and famous jazz standards.

courses.title: Drumming 101
courses.description: Learn to play the drums with lessons on rhythm, technique, and various drumming styles.

courses.title: Music Theory Basics
courses.description: Understand the fundamentals of music theory, including notation, harmony, and composition.
